PropertyInfo.Name: ProgressColour
PropertyInfo.Signature2: System.Tuple`3[[System.Byte, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.Byte, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.Byte, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]] ProgressColour

ModuleInfo.Description: This module is used to validate the Trip Distance of the TASHA results. As an input, it takes in the currently scheduled households and uses the trip chains of each member and calculates the Manhattan distance between the origin and destination of each trip. Finally, it outputs a file which has the frequency of all distances traveled.
